duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and engineer small cell solutions with a focus on DAS design and optimization.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Create and execute DAS and small cell network designs and proposals using planning tools and sales process workflow systems.
Interface with customers and cultivate relationships with their engineering teams.
Coordinate, oversee, or perform system optimization of multi-node outdoor SCN systems and troubleshoot performance issues.
Provide planning, coordination, and drive testing including CW, benchmark, and optimization for small cell networks.
Support NOC and troubleshoot performance issues, new technology trials, and ongoing system testing, analysis, and troubleshooting.
Conduct field work and measurements, utilize test equipment and run post-processing software for system testing and reporting.

education_certification.credential: BSEE; MSEE preferred, with 2-4 years of RF engineering experience or equivalent, familiar with small cell architecture, prediction tools, and 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G wireless technologies.
